data.context: 67% of Sydney businesses we audit have fewer than 10 quality backlinks pointing to their website. Meanwhile, their page-one competitors average 127 quality links each. That's not just a statistic – it's a $73,000 annual revenue gap for the average [Sydney](/blog/2025-10-04-how-to-optimise-your-google-business-profile-for-sydney-local-search-in-2025/) business.

data.context: When a Pyrmont tech startup came to us, they'd paid $8,000 for "300 high-quality backlinks." Analysis revealed 276 were from overseas link farms. Google had actually penalised their rankings. It took six months to disavow the toxic links and rebuild their authority properly.
